oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Consumers Can Transform Global Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egelyng, H.
Hermansen, J.E.
Kledal, P.
Knudsen, M.T.

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Globalizing certified organic consumption and production has potential to help transform world agriculture towards stronger environmental and socio-economic sustainability.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Egelyng, H.; Hermansen, J.E.; Kledal, P.; Knudsen, M.T.; Oelofse, M. and de Neergaard, A. (2011) Organic Consumers Can Transform Global Agriculture. Science Policy Forum , pp. 1-5. [Submitted]
